nodes.text: The Peldon Minor system was located in the star cluster that eventually became the Cassander subsector, a part of the Cassander sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the astronomical object Peldon Minor, which saw Galactic Republic military actions during the Clone Wars.

The Peldon Minor system was mentioned in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-5.
